title: How to generate SEO articles from keywords - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I love your question! I will tell you why. Most people (including myself) want to write a post and then find a keyword they can rank for. You are asking the opposite: Once you find a keyword, how do you create a post? Great question! I wondered that myself. I found a keyword I thought I could rank for. I am interested in the topic but didn’t know what content to write. Guess what! I have the answer! It is found in a free tool called Ubersuggest. Ubersuggest is Neil Patel’s tool. He’s terrific. In a recent update of Ubersuggest, Neil Patel included competitor analysis. It works like this: Go to Ubersuggest's Free Keyword Tool, Generate More Suggestions Put in your keyword in the Search Bar. Off to the left, you will see “Content Ideas.” Click it. You’ll find the content ideas for the posts that currently rank on Page 1 for that keyword! Naturally, you should make the content your own, but you’ll get some valuable ideas for these posts that already ranked along with being able to do important competitor analysis. Here is a tutorial explaining how to use the current version of Ubersuggest. Ubersuggest io: How to Easily Use 2 New, Free Features to Boost Your SEO Janice

Here’s a really simple way to generate SEO articles from keywords… Put your target keyword into Answer the Public.Write answer posts to the questions discovered. :)This article can provide you with some more resources: Best Tools for Generating Blog Content Ideas That Boost SEO Good luck!
